00032 void initQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv *env){
00033         // init MPI environment
00034         int rank, numRanks, initialized;
00035         MPI_Initialized(&initialized);
00036         if (!initialized){
00037                 MPI_Init(NULL, NULL);
00038                 MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &numRanks);
00039                 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
00040 
00041                 if (DEBUG) {
00042                         char hostName[256];
00043                         int hostNameLen;
00044                         MPI_Get_processor_name(hostName, &hostNameLen);
00045                         printf("rank %d on host %s\n", rank, hostName);
00046                 }
00047                 env->rank=rank;
00048                 env->numRanks=numRanks;
00049 
00050         // init MT random number generator with two keys -- time and pid 
00051         // it is ok that all procs will get the same seed as random numbers will only be 
00052         // used by the master process
00053         unsigned long int secs = time(NULL);
00054         unsigned long int pid = getpid();
00055         unsigned long int key[2];
00056         key[0] = secs; key[1] = pid;
00057         init_by_array(key, 2);
00058         } else printf("ERROR: Trying to initialize QuESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00059 }
00060 
00061 void syncQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00062         MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00063 }
00064 
00065 int syncQuESTSuccess(int successCode){
00066         int totalSuccess;
00067         MPI_Allreduce(&successCode, &totalSuccess, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_LAND, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00068         return totalSuccess;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void closeQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00072         int finalized;
00073         MPI_Finalized(&finalized);
00074         if (!finalized) MPI_Finalize();
00075         else printf("ERROR: Trying to close QuESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00076 }

00078 void reportQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00079         if (env.rank==0){
00080                 printf("EXECUTION ENVIRONMENT:\n"); 
00081                 printf("Running distributed (MPI) version\n");
00082                 printf("Number of ranks is %d\n", env.numRanks);
00083 # ifdef _OPENMP
00084                 printf("OpenMP enabled\n");
00085                 printf("Number of threads available is %d\n", omp_get_max_threads());
00086 # else
00087                 printf("OpenMP disabled\n");
00088 # endif 
00089                 printf("Precision: size of REAL is %ld bytes\n", sizeof(REAL));
00090         }
00091 }

00093 void reportNodeList(QuESTEnv env){
00094         char hostName[256];
00095         gethostname(hostName, 255);
00096         printf("hostname on rank %d: %s\n", env.rank, hostName);
00097 }

00099 int getChunkIdFromIndex(MultiQubit multiQubit, long long int index){
00100         return index/multiQubit.numAmps; // this is numAmpsPerChunk
00101 }
00102 
00103 REAL getRealAmpEl(MultiQubit multiQubit, long long int index){
00104         int chunkId = getChunkIdFromIndex(multiQubit, index);
00105         REAL el; 
00106         if (multiQubit.chunkId==chunkId){
00107                 el = multiQubit.stateVec.real[index-chunkId*multiQubit.numAmps];
00108         }
00109         MPI_Bcast(&el, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, chunkId, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00110         return el; 
00111 } 
00112 
00113 REAL getImagAmpEl(MultiQubit multiQubit, long long int index){
00114         int chunkId = getChunkIdFromIndex(multiQubit, index);
00115         REAL el; 
00116         if (multiQubit.chunkId==chunkId){
00117                 el = multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index-chunkId*multiQubit.numAmps];
00118         }
00119         MPI_Bcast(&el, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, chunkId, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00120         return el; 
00121 }
00122 
00123 REAL calcTotalProbability(MultiQubit multiQubit){
00124   /* IJB - implemented using Kahan summation for greater accuracy at a slight floating
00125      point operation overhead. For more details see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kahan_summation_algorithm */
00126   /* Don't change the bracketing in this routine! */
00127   REAL pTotal=0; 
00128   REAL y, t, c;
00129   REAL allRankTotals=0;
00130   long long int index;
00131   long long int numAmpsPerRank = multiQubit.numAmps;
00132   c = 0.0;
00133   for (index=0; index<numAmpsPerRank; index++){ 
00134     /* Perform pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]; by Kahan */
00135     y = multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index] - c;
00136     t = pTotal + y;
00137     c = ( t - pTotal ) - y;
00138     pTotal = t;
00139     /* Perform pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]; by Kahan */
00140     y = multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index] - c;
00141     t = pTotal + y;
00142     c = ( t - pTotal ) - y;
00143     pTotal = t;
00144   } 
00145   if (DEBUG) printf("before calc prob. %d\n", multiQubit.numChunks);
00146   if (multiQubit.numChunks>1) MPI_Allreduce(&pTotal, &allRankTotals, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00147   else allRankTotals=pTotal;
00148   
00149   return allRankTotals;
00150 }

00161 static int chunkIsUpper(int chunkId, long long int chunkSize, int targetQubit)
00162 {       
00163         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (targetQubit);
00164         long long int sizeBlock = sizeHalfBlock*2;
00165         long long int posInBlock = (chunkId*chunkSize) % sizeBlock;
00166         return posInBlock<sizeHalfBlock;
00167 }
00168 
00183 static void getRotAngle(int chunkIsUpper, Complex *rot1, Complex *rot2, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00184 {
00185         if (chunkIsUpper){
00186                 *rot1=alpha;
00187                 rot2->real=-beta.real;
00188                 rot2->imag=-beta.imag;
00189         } else {
00190                 *rot1=beta;
00191                 *rot2=alpha;
00192         }
00193 }
00194 
00208 static void getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(int chunkIsUpper, Complex *rot1, Complex *rot2, ComplexMatrix2 u)
00209 {
00210         if (chunkIsUpper){
00211                 *rot1=u.r0c0;
00212                 *rot2=u.r0c1;
00213         } else {
00214                 *rot1=u.r1c0;
00215                 *rot2=u.r1c1;
00216         }
00217 }
00218 
00228 static int getChunkPairId(int chunkIsUpper, int chunkId, long long int chunkSize, int targetQubit)
00229 {
00230         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (targetQubit);
00231         int chunksPerHalfBlock = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00232         if (chunkIsUpper){
00233                 return chunkId + chunksPerHalfBlock;
00234         } else {
00235                 return chunkId - chunksPerHalfBlock;
00236         }
00237 }
00238 
00246 static int halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(long long int chunkSize, int targetQubit)
00247 {
00248         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (targetQubit);
00249         if (chunkSize > sizeHalfBlock) return 1;
00250         else return 0;
00251 }
00252 
00253 void exchangeStateVectors(MultiQubit multiQubit, int pairRank){
00254         // MPI send/receive vars
00255         int TAG=100;
00256         MPI_Status status;
00257 
00258         // Multiple messages are required as MPI uses int rather than long long int for count
00259         // For openmpi, messages are further restricted to 2GB in size -- do this for all cases
00260         // to be safe
00261         long long int maxMessageCount = 1LL<<29;
00262         if (sizeof(REAL)==8) maxMessageCount = (1LL<<28);
00263         else if (sizeof(REAL)==16) maxMessageCount = (1LL<<27);
00264 
00265         if (multiQubit.numAmps<maxMessageCount) maxMessageCount = multiQubit.numAmps;
00266         int numMessages = multiQubit.numAmps/maxMessageCount;
00267         int i;
00268         long long int offset;
00269         if (DEBUG) printf("numMessages %d maxMessageCount %lld\n", numMessages, maxMessageCount);
00270 
00271         // send my state vector to pairRank's multiQubit.pairStateVec
00272         // receive pairRank's state vector into multiQubit.pairStateVec
00273         for (i=0; i<numMessages; i++){
00274                 offset = i*maxMessageCount;
00275                 MPI_Sendrecv(&multiQubit.stateVec.real[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL, pairRank, TAG,
00276                                  &multiQubit.pairStateVec.real[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL,
00277                                  pairRank, TAG, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00278                 //printf("rank: %d err: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, err);
00279                 MPI_Sendrecv(&multiQubit.stateVec.imag[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL, pairRank, TAG,
00280                                 &multiQubit.pairStateVec.imag[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL,
00281                                 pairRank, TAG, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00282         }
00283 }
00284 
00285 void compactUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00286 {
00287         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00288         QuESTAssert(validateAlphaBeta(alpha, beta), 6, __func__);
00289 
00290         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00291         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00292         Complex rot1, rot2;
00293 
00294         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00295         int rankIsUpper;
00296         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00297 
00298         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00299                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00300                 compactUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, alpha, beta);
00301         } else {
00302                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00303                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00304                 getRotAngle(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, alpha, beta);
00305                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00306                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00307                         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00308 
00309                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. 
00310                         // send values to compactUnitaryDistributed in the correct order
00311                 if (rankIsUpper){
00312                         compactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00313                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00314                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00315                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00316                 } else {
00317                         compactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00318                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00319                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00320                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00321                 }
00322         }
00323 }
00324 
00325 void unitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u)
00326 {
00327         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00328         QuESTAssert(validateMatrixIsUnitary(u), 5, __func__);
00329 
00330         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00331         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00332         Complex rot1, rot2;
00333 
00334         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00335         int rankIsUpper;
00336         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00337 
00338         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00339                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00340                 unitaryLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, u);
00341         } else {
00342                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00343                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00344                 getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, u);
00345                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00346                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00347                         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00348 
00349                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. 
00350                 // send values to compactUnitaryDistributed in the correct order
00351                 if (rankIsUpper){
00352                         unitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00353                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00354                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00355                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00356                 } else {
00357                         unitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00358                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00359                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00360                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00361                 }
00362         }
00363

00367 void controlledCompactUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00368 {
00369         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00370         QuESTAssert(controlQubit >= 0 && controlQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00371         QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, 3, __func__);
00372         QuESTAssert(validateAlphaBeta(alpha, beta), 6, __func__);
00373 
00374         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00375         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00376         Complex rot1, rot2;
00377 
00378         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00379         int rankIsUpper;
00380         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00381 
00382         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00383                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00384                 controlledCompactUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, controlQubit, targetQubit, alpha, beta);
00385         } else {
00386                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00387                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00388                 getRotAngle(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, alpha, beta);
00389                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00390                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00391                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00392                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00393                 
00394                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to controlledCompactUnitaryDistributed
00395                 // in the correct order
00396                 if (rankIsUpper){
00397                         controlledCompactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00398                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00399                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00400                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00401                 } else {
00402                         controlledCompactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00403                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00404                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00405                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00406                 }
00407         }
00408 }

00410 void controlledUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, 
00411         ComplexMatrix2 u)
00412 {
00413         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00414         QuESTAssert(controlQubit >= 0 && controlQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00415         QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, 3, __func__);
00416         QuESTAssert(validateMatrixIsUnitary(u), 5, __func__);
00417 
00418         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00419         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00420         Complex rot1, rot2;
00421 
00422         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00423         int rankIsUpper;
00424         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00425 
00426         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00427                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00428                 controlledUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, controlQubit, targetQubit, u);
00429         } else {
00430                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00431                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00432                 getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, u);
00433                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00434                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00435                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00436                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00437                 
00438                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to controlledUnitaryDistributed
00439                 // in the correct order
00440                 if (rankIsUpper){
00441                         controlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00442                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00443                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00444                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00445                 } else {
00446                         controlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00447                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00448                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00449                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00450                 }
00451         }
00452 }

00454 void multiControlledUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, int* controlQubits, const int numControlQubits, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u)
00455 {
00456         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00457         QuESTAssert(numControlQubits > 0 && numControlQubits <= multiQubit.numQubits, 4, __func__);
00458         QuESTAssert(validateMatrixIsUnitary(u), 5, __func__);
00459          
00460         long long int mask=0;
00461         for (int i=0; i<numControlQubits; i++) mask = mask | (1LL<<controlQubits[i]);
00462         QuESTAssert(mask >=0 && mask <= (1LL<<multiQubit.numQubits)-1, 2, __func__);
00463         QuESTAssert((mask & (1LL<<targetQubit)) != (1LL<<targetQubit), 3, __func__);
00464         
00465         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00466         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00467         Complex rot1, rot2;
00468 
00469         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00470         int rankIsUpper;
00471         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00472 
00473         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00474                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00475                 multiControlledUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, mask, u);
00476         } else {
00477                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00478                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00479                 getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, u);
00480                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00481                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00482                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00483                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00484                 
00485                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to multiControlledUnitaryDistributed
00486                 // in the correct order
00487                 if (rankIsUpper){
00488                         multiControlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,mask,rot1,rot2,
00489                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00490                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00491                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00492                 } else {
00493                         multiControlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,mask,rot1,rot2,
00494                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00495                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00496                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00497                 }
00498         }
00499 }
00500 void sigmaX(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit)
00501 {
00502         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00503 
00504         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00505         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00506 
00507         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00508         int rankIsUpper;
00509         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00510 
00511         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00512                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00513                 sigmaXLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit);
00514         } else {
00515                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00516                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00517                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00518                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00519                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00520                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00521                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. sigmaX just replaces
00522                 // this rank's values with pair values
00523                 sigmaXDistributed(multiQubit, targetQubit,
00524                         multiQubit.pairStateVec, // in
00525                         multiQubit.stateVec); // out
00526         }
00527 }
00528 
00529 void controlledNot(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit)
00530 {
00531         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00532         QuESTAssert(controlQubit >= 0 && controlQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00533         QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, 3, __func__);
00534 
00535         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00536         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00537 
00538         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00539         int rankIsUpper;
00540         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00541 
00542         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00543                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00544                 controlledNotLocal(multiQubit, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00545         } else {
00546                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00547                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00548                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00549                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00550                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00551                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00552                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to controlledNot
00553                 // in the correct order
00554                 if (rankIsUpper){
00555                         controlledNotDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,
00556                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //in
00557                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //out
00558                 } else {
00559                         controlledNotDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,
00560                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //in
00561                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //out
00562                 }
00563         }
00564 }
00565 
00566 void sigmaY(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit)
00567 {
00568         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00569 
00570         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00571         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00572 
00573         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00574         int rankIsUpper;
00575         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00576 
00577         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00578                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00579                 sigmaYLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit);
00580         } else {
00582                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00583                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00584                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00585                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00586                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00587                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00588                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. sigmaX just replaces
00589                 // this rank's values with pair values
00590                 sigmaYDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,
00591                         multiQubit.pairStateVec, // in
00592                         multiQubit.stateVec, // out
00593                         rankIsUpper);
00594         }
00595 }
00596 
00597 void phaseGate(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit, enum phaseGateType type)
00598 {
00599         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00600 
00601         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00602         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00603 
00604         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00605         int rankIsUpper;
00606 
00607         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00608                 phaseGateLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, type);
00609         } else {
00610                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00611                 if (!rankIsUpper) phaseGateDistributed(multiQubit, targetQubit, type);
00612         }
00613 }
00614 
00615 void hadamard(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit)
00616 {
00617         QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00618 
00619         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00620         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00621 
00622         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00623         int rankIsUpper;
00624         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00625 
00626         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00627                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00628                 hadamardLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit);
00629         } else {
00630                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00631                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00632                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00633                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00634                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00635                 exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00636                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to hadamardDistributed
00637                 // in the correct order
00638                 if (rankIsUpper){
00639                         hadamardDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,
00640                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00641                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00642                                 multiQubit.stateVec, rankIsUpper); //output
00643                 } else {
00644                         hadamardDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,
00645                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00646                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00647                                 multiQubit.stateVec, rankIsUpper); //output
00648                 }
00649         }
00650 }
00651 
00652 
00663 static int isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(int chunkId, long long int chunkSize, int measureQubit)
00664 {
00665         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (measureQubit);
00666         int numChunksToSkip = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00667         // calculate probability by summing over numChunksToSkip, then skipping numChunksToSkip, etc
00668         int bitToCheck = chunkId & numChunksToSkip;
00669         return bitToCheck;
00670 }
00671 
00672 REAL findProbabilityOfOutcome(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int measureQubit, int outcome)
00673 {
00674     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00675 
00676         REAL stateProb=0, totalStateProb=0;
00677         int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00678         if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00679                 stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00680         } else {
00681                 if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00682                         stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroDistributed(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00683                 } else stateProb = 0;
00684         }
00685         MPI_Allreduce(&stateProb, &totalStateProb, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00686         if (outcome==1) totalStateProb = 1.0 - totalStateProb;
00687         return totalStateProb;
00688 }
00689 
00690 
00691 REAL collapseToOutcome(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int measureQubit, int outcome)
00692 {
00693     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00694 
00695         REAL totalStateProb=findProbabilityOfOutcome(multiQubit, measureQubit, outcome);
00696     QuESTAssert(fabs(totalStateProb>REAL_EPS), 8, __func__);
00697 
00698         int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00699     if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00700         collapseToOutcomeLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit, totalStateProb, outcome);
00701     } else {
00702         if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00703             // chunk has amps for q=0
00704             if (outcome==0) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00705                     totalStateProb);
00706             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00707         } else {
00708             // chunk has amps for q=1
00709             if (outcome==1) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00710                     totalStateProb);
00711             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00712         }
00713     }
00714         return totalStateProb;
00715 }
00716 
00717 
00718 int measure(MultiQubit multiQubit, int measureQubit){
00719     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00720     REAL stateProb; 
00721     return measureWithStats(multiQubit, measureQubit, &stateProb); 
00722 }
00723 
00724 int measureWithStats(MultiQubit multiQubit, int measureQubit, REAL *stateProb){
00725     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00726 
00727     int outcome;
00728     // find probability of qubit being in state 1
00729     REAL stateProbInternal = findProbabilityOfOutcome(multiQubit, measureQubit, 1);
00730 
00731     // we can't collapse to a state that has a probability too close to zero
00732     if (stateProbInternal<REAL_EPS) outcome=0;
00733     else if (1-stateProbInternal<REAL_EPS) outcome=1;
00734     else {
00735         // ok. both P(0) and P(1) are large enough to resolve
00736         // generate random float on [0,1]
00737         float randNum = genrand_real1();
00738         if (randNum<=stateProbInternal) outcome = 1;
00739         else outcome = 0;
00740     } 
00741     if (outcome==0) stateProbInternal = 1-stateProbInternal;
00742 
00743         int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00744     if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00745         collapseToOutcomeLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit, stateProbInternal, outcome);
00746     } else {
00747         if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00748             // chunk has amps for q=0
00749             if (outcome==0) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00750                     stateProbInternal);
00751             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00752         } else {
00753             // chunk has amps for q=1
00754             if (outcome==1) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00755                     stateProbInternal);
00756             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00757         }
00758     }
00759 
00760     *stateProb = stateProbInternal;
00761     return outcome;
00762 }
00763 
00764 void exitWithError(int errorCode, const char* func){
00765     printf("!!!\n");
00766     printf("QuEST Error in function %s: %s\n", func, errorCodes[errorCode]);
00767     printf("!!!\n");
00768     printf("exiting..\n");
00769     MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD, errorCode);
00770 }
00771 
00772 void QuESTAssert(int isValid, int errorCode, const char* func){
00773     if (!isValid) exitWithError(errorCode, func);
00774 }
